> > least I remember that :) So basically this means that when =

in our framework (so

t the fitness of 
the

It is possible to lose the champion if the best species=
 itself has a 
size of less than 5 (I think 5 is the number- it could be 4)=
.  Then 
its champion will not be duplicated.  If that is happening, it may=
 
indicate that your species are too small (because the best species 
shoul=
d after all not be so small), which suggests that the 
compatibility thresh=
old is not set well.  You may consider making it 
more inclusive (i.e. sett=
ing it higher) to get bigger species, or, 
probably better, to use a dynami=
c threshold that changes in order to 
maintain a target # of species.

ken
